name: R-Evolution
description:
This was thrown together sooooooooooo......... No Sound. I ran out of time but I think I made a pretty decent game still. 

How it fits with the THEME

A. Your mob gets larger therefore changing therefore evolving.

B. The king has evolved badly so he's fat. I guess.

You can use controller or keyboard. You can use WASD, Arrow keys, And the Left Stick.
